title: The Bargaining Hero: Zelda Gonzales' Epic Week
summary: Zelda Gonzales discovers her power to alter reality through bargaining during a week of teaching and dealing with a mysterious villain.
summaryGerman: Zelda Gonzales entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, die Realität durch Feilschen zu verändern, während sie eine Woche lang unterrichtet und mit einem geheimnisvollen Bösewicht zu tun hat.
summaryDutch: Zelda Gonzales ontdekt haar kracht om de realiteit te veranderen door te onderhandelen tijdens een week van lesgeven en omgaan met een mysterieuze schurk.
summaryFrench: Zelda Gonzales découvre son pouvoir de modifier la réalité grâce au marchandage pendant une semaine d'enseignement et de confrontation avec un vilain mystérieux.

story.text: Zelda starts her week feeling energetic as she prepares a new set of bargaining strategies for her upcoming school auction.
While teaching, she unintentionally changes a student's failing grade to passing with just a persuasive argument, hinting at her unknown power.
Zelda bargains with a strange seller for an ancient artifact, unaware it will unlock her ability to alter the fabric of reality.
After accidentally changing a streetlight's color while discussing city safety, she grows suspicious of her new abilities.
Zelda decides to confront her powers directly, manipulating small objects around her home to better understand her capabilities.
Her actions catch the attention of a villain seeking to exploit her powers, leading to a suspense-filled confrontation.
Successfully outbargaining the villain with clever tactics and moral persuasions, Zelda vows to use her abilities for the greater good.

ending: Zelda Gonzales, now known as 'The Bargaining Hero', continues her life, forever ready to negotiate the balance between ordinary and extraordinary.
moral: Even the most ordinary skills, when embraced, can reveal extraordinary abilities.
